description:
Le Parfum Intense Eau De Parfum - A Luxurious Olfactory Journey

Discover the captivating allure of Elie Saab Le Parfum Intense, a sophisticated fragrance that embodies timeless elegance and feminine charm. This bestselling 90ml eau de parfum creates an unforgettable sensory experience with its rich and opulent composition. âœ¨

Orange Blossom, Ylang-Ylang ðŸŒ¸ Honey, Rose, Jasmine ðŸŒ¿ Patchouli, Amber, Vanilla ðŸ’Ž

Key Features of Elie Saab Le Parfum Intense

  • Enhanced concentration for superior longevity ðŸ”¥
  • Signature orange blossom accord with added depth
  • Luxurious amber and honey accords for warmth
  • Elegant crystal-inspired bottle design
  • Perfect for evening wear and special occasions
  • Developed by master perfumer Francis Kurkdjian

Created by the renowned Lebanese fashion designer Elie Saab, Le Parfum Intense was launched in 2013 as a more concentrated and sophisticated version of the original Le Parfum. This oriental floral masterpiece was crafted by the legendary Francis Kurkdjian, who enhanced the signature orange blossom accord with deeper, more sensual notes of honey and amber. ðŸ’«

The intense eau de parfum opens with a radiant burst of orange blossom and ylang-ylang, transitioning to a heart of honey-infused rose and jasmine. The base reveals a luxurious foundation of patchouli, amber, and vanilla, creating a captivating trail that lingers for hours. This new arrival to our collection embodies sophisticated femininity with remarkable staying power. ðŸŒ¸

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Elie Saab Le Parfum Intense last on skin?
Elie Saab Le Parfum Intense offers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on skin. The higher concentration of fragrance oils in this intense version ensures the scent develops beautifully throughout the day. The base notes of amber, patchouli, and vanilla create a lasting impression that may remain as a subtle skin scent even longer. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and moisturized skin. âœ¨
short_description: An opulent oriental-floral masterpiece, Elie Saab Le Parfum Intense (90ml) envelops you in luxurious orange blossom, honey-infused rose, and amber-vanilla warmth. This sophisticated fragrance offers exceptional longevity and sillage, perfect for unforgettable evenings.
